name: JSONSerialization
desc: An object that converts between JSON and the equivalent Foundation objects.

items.name: class func jsonObject(with: Data, options: JSONSerialization.ReadingOptions) -> Any
items.desc: Returns a Foundation object from given JSON data.

items.name: class func jsonObject(with: InputStream, options: JSONSerialization.ReadingOptions) -> Any
items.desc: Returns a Foundation object from JSON data in a given stream.

items.name: struct JSONSerialization.ReadingOptions
items.desc: Options used when creating Foundation objects from JSON data.

items.name: class func data(withJSONObject: Any, options: JSONSerialization.WritingOptions) -> Data
items.desc: Returns JSON data from a Foundation object.

items.name: class func writeJSONObject(Any, to: OutputStream, options: JSONSerialization.WritingOptions, error: NSErrorPointer) -> Int
items.desc: Writes a given JSON object to a stream.

items.name: class func isValidJSONObject(Any) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the serializer can convert a given object to JSON data.
